name: Digital Graveyard
description:
a game made to explore our digital footprints that we leave online, and how that will impact the future. 

when we live so much of our lives online nowadays, the electric ocean just gets cluttered with digital trash. eventually, we'll need people to sift through it all. that's where the Gravekeepers come in.

art, writing, code, everything by me

except music done by a friend :))
